tags.label: Filter by tags:
tags.placeholder: Type to search and select tags...
tags.selected: Showing items with any of the selected tags

empty.noSources: Try adding a source in the Sources tab
empty.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your filters or search terms

card.noWorkspaceTooltip: Open a workspace to install marketplace items

install.title: Install {{name}}
install.configurationDescription: Configure the parameters required for this MCP server
install.whatNextMcp: You can now configure and use this MCP server. Click the MCP icon in the sidebar to switch tabs.
install.whatNextMode: You can now use this mode. Click the Modes icon in the sidebar to switch tabs.

sources.title: Configure Marketplace Sources
sources.description: Add Git repositories that contain marketplace items. These repositories will be fetched when browsing the marketplace.

add.title: Add New Source
add.urlFormats: Supported formats: HTTPS (https://github.com/username/repo), SSH (git@github.com:username/repo.git), or Git protocol (git://github.com/username/repo.git)

current.title: Current Sources
current.empty: No sources configured. Add a source to get started.

errors.nonVisibleChars: URL contains non-visible characters other than spaces
errors.invalidGitUrl: URL must be a valid Git repository URL (e.g., https://github.com/username/repo)
errors.duplicateUrl: This URL is already in the list (case and whitespace insensitive match)
errors.nameTooLong: Name must be 20 characters or less
errors.nonVisibleCharsName: Name contains non-visible characters other than spaces
errors.duplicateName: This name is already in use (case and whitespace insensitive match)
errors.emojiName: Emoji characters may cause display issues

footer.issueText: Found a problem with a marketplace item or have suggestions for new ones? <0>Open a GitHub issue</0> to let us know!
